headline: OTT Pay Enhances its All-in-One Smart Terminal, Adds UnionPay, Discover, and Diners Club to its Payment Acceptance
summary: OTT Pay, a leading end-to-end payment gateway, announces the launch of the OTT Pay Plus App 12 in 1. The release includes significant updates to OTT Pay's current platform, including enhancements to shift reporting and, most notably, the addition of UnionPay Card, Discover, and Diners Club payment acceptance.

raw.headline: OTT Pay Enhances its All-in-One Smart Terminal, Adds UnionPay, Discover, and Diners Club to its Payment Acceptance
raw.summary: OTT Pay, a leading end-to-end payment gateway, announces the launch of the OTT Pay Plus App 12 in 1. headline: Fidem Financial and Transformco Launch the Shop Your Way 5321 Visa Credit Card®*, Redefining Co-Brand Economics and Consumer Value
summary: PHILADELPHIA & CHICAGO, November 03, 2025--Fidem Financial ("Fidem"), a credit card asset management, loyalty and servicing platform built for modern co-brands, today announced that it has partnered with Transformco, a diversified consumer services and brand company, and Shop Your Way® ("SYW"), a leading loyalty and rewards network serving millions of members, to launch the reimagined Shop Your Way® 5321 Visa® Credit Card.

raw.headline: Fidem Financial and Transformco Launch the Shop Your Way 5321 Visa Credit Card®*, Redefining Co-Brand Economics and Consumer Value

headline: Marqeta Powers Expansion of Klarna Debit Card Across Europe
summary: OAKLAND, Calif., November 03, 2025--Marqeta, Inc. (NASDAQ: MQ), the modern card issuing platform, today announced it is working with Klarna, the global digital bank and flexible payments provider, to expand the Klarna Card into 15 new European markets. This launch extends Marqeta’s long-term partnership with Klarna and leverages Visa’s Flexible Credential (VFC) technology, enabling customers to choose between paying now or later, all through a single debit card experience.

raw.headline: Marqeta Powers Expansion of Klarna Debit Card Across Europe

This launch extends Marqeta’s long-term partnership with Klarna and leverages Visa’s Flexible Credential (VFC) technology, enabling customers to choose between paying now or later, all through a single debit card experience.

headline: Afriex, Visa partner to deliver real-time cross-border payments to over 160 markets
summary: Afriex has announced a collaboration with Visa to facilitate real-time cross-border payments to over 160 markets. The integration of Visa Direct through Afriex’s financial institution partner allows seamless, real-time delivery of funds directly to eligible Visa endpoints, linking to billions of accounts worldwide. The collaboration is aimed at making it easier for individuals and businesses…

headline: Custom Design Payment Card Issuance at Hong Kong Fintech Week 2025
